title: A Storm of Swords (A Song of Ice and Fire, Book 3)

highlights.text: “A man who would violate his own sister, murder his king, and fling an innocent child to his death deserves no other name.”
She’s the Hound with teats,
“When the sun has set, no candle can replace it.”
“It is too late for ifs, and too late for rescues,” Catelyn said. “All that remains is vengeance.”
“The greatest fools are ofttimes more clever than the men who laugh at them,”
“Kill me, and be cursed. You are no king of mine.”
“but if you try it again, I thall take your other hand, or perhapth a foot.”
“You’re hard enough to look at with a nose. Besides, I wanted to make the goat say ‘thapphireth.’” He chuckled.
I will pay this debt with interest.
“Extravagance has its uses. We must demonstrate the power and wealth of Casterly Rock for all the realm to see.”
Maybe pretending is how you get brave,
We are the forgotten fellowship.” “Send me on my way and I’ll forget you too,” Clegane rasped.
Ser Barristan once told me that the rot in King Aerys’s reign began with Varys.
There is no man in the Seven Kingdoms who will be less welcome at a Tyrell wedding,
“Life would be much simpler if men could fuck themselves, don’t you agree?
I came for justice for Elia and her children, and I will have it.
Bastard, oathbreaker, and turncloak
“What’s wrong with flowers?” “Nothing, for a bee. For bed I want one o’ these.” Ygritte made to grab the front of his breeches.

“But that was the tourney when he crowned Lyanna Stark as queen of love and beauty!” said Dany. “Princess Elia was there, his wife, and yet my brother gave the crown to the Stark girl, and later stole her away from her betrothed. How could he do that? Did the Dornish woman treat him so ill?”
Arya was lost. “Who’s Wylla?” “Jon Snow’s mother. He never told you? She’s served us for years and years. Since before I was born.”
“My aunt Allyria says Lady Ashara and your father fell in love at Harrenhal—”
Aerys had chosen him to spite his father, to rob Lord Tywin of his heir.
“The goat is Lord of Harrenhal, and the Lord of Harrenhal does not haggle.”
“If her maidenhead’s as hard as the rest of her, the goat will break his cock off trying to get in,”
the Greatjon not to drink was like telling him not to breathe for a few hours.
“I hear Tully men have trout between their legs instead of cocks,”
“Look at this little thing! No meat on her at all!”
“Sansa is no longer yours to torment. Understand that, monster.”
“The part about you hiding under Casterly Rock does sound like Robert.”
“Not Robert the Second,” Tyrion said. “Aerys the Third.”
“He could not harm his own blood.” “Lord Renly will be glad to hear this.”
You are grown so very great now, yet the higher a man climbs the farther he has to fall.”
“Under the sea the old fish eat the young fish,”
“Only a starving man begs bread from a beggar,”
“A man is never so vulnerable in battle as when he flees,”
“A running man is like a wounded animal to a soldier. It gets his bloodlust up.”
I knew a man, Scarb, this Oznak cut his liver out. Claimed to be defending a lady’s honor, he did, said Scarb had raped her with his eyes. How do you rape a wench with eyes, I ask you?
There are old sellswords and bold sellswords, but no old bold sellswords.”
“To Aegon. What a fortunate fellow. Two sisters, two wives, and three big dragons, what more could a man ask for?”
ruby lion, emerald rose, onyx stag, silver trout, blue jade falcon, opal sun, and pearl direwolf.
“Never believe anything you hear in a song, my lady.”
Stepped right into the cut, Joff. “Why, you’re the only man in the hall that I’m certain of defeating!”
“Father help him, someone help him, my son, my son . . .” Tyrion found himself thinking of Robb Stark. My own wedding is looking much better in hindsight.

Always keep your foes confused. If they are never certain who you are or what you want, they cannot know what you are like to do next. Sometimes the best way to baffle them is to make moves that have no purpose, or even seem to work against you. Remember that, Sansa, when you come to play the game.” “What . . . what game?” “The only game. The game of thrones.”
“The gods had no part in it. Catelyn Stark gave me back. Her, and the Lord of the Dreadfort.”
“Any cat may stare into a fire and see red mice at play.”
You are a son of Winterfell, a nephew of Benjen Stark. It must be you or no one. The Wall is yours, Jon Snow.”
Leave him for the wolves and wild dogs. Your brothers and mine.”
“The little wolf bitch wants to join the Night’s Watch, does she?”
“If I wanted wits, I’d marry you.”
“Men are seldom as they appear. You look so very guilty that I am convinced of your innocence.

Sole champion of Lord Steffon’s tourney at Storm’s End, whereat he unhorsed Lord Robert Baratheon, Prince Oberyn Martell, Lord Leyton Hightower, Lord Jon Connington, Lord Jason Mallister, and Prince Rhaegar Targaryen.
Everyone wants something, Alayne. And when you know what a man wants you know who he is, and how to move him.”
It’s not the when o’ dying that matters, it’s the how of it,
Begging for help never gets you any.
“Oh, gods,” he said. “Jaime, I am so sorry, but . . . gods be good, look at the two of us. Handless and Noseless, the Lannister boys.”
“They made me fight a battle without my big brother to protect me.”
Lord Tywin Lannister did not, in the end, shit gold.
A toad grows wings and thinks he’s a bloody dragon.”
“If the tales be true, that’s not the first giant to end up with his head on Winterfell’s walls.”
You told me to put the tears in Jon’s wine, and I did. For Robert, and for us! And I wrote Catelyn and told her the Lannisters had killed my lord husband, just as you said.
Why buy a cow when there were udders all around begging to be milked?
